info.name: SoundCloud-Waveform-Changer
info.description: This just changes the waveform color! It does so by just using simple rgb code to make it different colors! it's pretty easy but it is effective! Enjoy it!
info.additionalInfo: If you wanna edit the colors, click on stylish, click the pen (aka the edit button!), this will bring you to the code! you can see 2 lines of code that read "210deg, and 210deg," look up the degrees of the color wheel and adjust it accordingly!
